restrictionByCondition.condition: #ByValuesEx( "Document.CashReceipt","Read","","","", "PettyCashes","T.PettyCash", "И CASE WHEN T.OperationKind = Значение(Enum.OperationKindsCashReceipt.FromCustomer) Или T.OperationKind = Значение(Enum.OperationKindsCashReceipt.FromVendor) THEN", "CounterpartiesGroup","T.Counterparty", "ELSE истина END", "","","","","","","","","", "","","", "","","", "","","", "","","", "","","", "","","", "","","", "","","", "","","", "","","", "","","" )
